issue.title: [Python] TensorFlow/PyTorch arrow ThreadPool workarounds not working in some settings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4025](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4025). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See the bug report in <https://github.com/ray-project/ray/issues/3520>

I wonder if we can revisit this issue and try to get rid of the workarounds we tried to deploy in the past.

See also the discussion in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2096>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4025?focusedCommentId=16932593) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
We've given up on this. The robust solution is to install manylinux2010 packages instead.
